item.title: 安妮特-贝宁说，她的孔雀新剧《苹果永不落》正是她在拍摄了 "紧张 "的电影《尼亚德》之后所需要的。

item.title: 特别法律顾问罗伯特-赫尔（Robert Hur）周二因决定纳入对拜登精神敏锐度的不友善评价而遭到民主党人的强烈反对，众议员亚当-希夫（Adam Schiff）声称他有意点燃了一场 "政治风暴"。
item.description:
Special Counsel Robert Hur confronted substantial pushback from Democrats Tuesday on his decision to include unflattering assessments of Biden’s mental acuity, with Rep. Adam Schiff claiming he knowingly ignited a “political firestorm.” pic.twitter.com/kESVaGtsst

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 12, 2024

item.title: 梅丽莎-贝努伊斯特（Melissa Benoist）说，由于她的 MAX 新剧《巴士上的女孩》（Girls on the Bus），她对记者有了新的尊重。该剧讲述了一个记者团中的女记者与总统候选人在竞选路上同行的故事。
item.description:
Melissa Benoist says she has new respect for journalists thanks to her new MAX series "Girls on the Bus." The show follows female journalists in a press corps traveling with presidential candidates on the campaign trail. pic.twitter.com/ml1zE9vwob

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 12, 2024
